Overlay.name: logic_id
Overlay.description: Renders a <input role="presentation" type="checkbox" /> as sibling before the Overlay, which controls the visible state via CSS.

Overlay.name: state
Overlay.description: Controls the visible state of the Overlay whenever logic_id is set.

Overlay.name: captive
Overlay.description: Renders a ContextBackdrop as a sibling before the Overlay, which becomes active whenever the visible state is active.

Overlay.name: dismissible
Overlay.description: Adjusts the sibling ContextBackdrop to be clickable, turning off the visible state when clicked.

Overlay.name: alignment
Overlay.description: Adjusts where the child content will be placed within the Overlay along both axis.

Overlay.name: alignment_x
Overlay.description: Adjusts where the child content will be placed within the Overlay along the horizontal axis.

Overlay.name: alignment_y
Overlay.description: Adjusts where the child content will be placed within the Overlay along the vertical axis.

Overlay.name: spacing
Overlay.description: Adjusts the visual spacing between child content in the Overlay.

Overlay.name: spacing_x
Overlay.description: Adjusts the horizontal visual spacing between child content in the Overlay.

Overlay.name: spacing_y
Overlay.description: Adjusts the vertical visual spacing between child content in the Overlay.

data.render:
Overlay

Overlay is typically used for rendering full-screen content over the rest of the page, optionally including a backdrop or being toggleable.

Imports

<script>
    import {Overlay} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

Logic ID

NOTE: When you use a ContextButton within the Overlay layout, it will automatically inherit the set logic_id via id Svelte Store.

You can make the Overlay toggleable via the logic_id property, and then referencing that with a Button.

Captive

You can optionally include a backdrop by passing via the captive property.

Dismissible

You can optionally have the Overlay dismissible by clicking the backdrop via the dismissible property.

State

WARNING: If you use this to toggle the Overlay, instead of something like the ContextButton. It will not work on Browsers without Javascript enabled.

You can manually open / close the Overlay via the state property.

Alignment

You can align Overlay content via the alignment, alignment_x, and alignment_y properties respectively.

Spacing

You can adjust the spacing between Overlay content via the spacing, spacing_x, and spacing_y properties respectively.
